learning_outcomes.description: Critically appraise the evidence underpinning inclusive education.
Identify the legislative and policy environment in which Australian educational settings operate.
Analyse the factors that contribute to educational exclusion and investigate practices that can address these.
Identify students who might be vulnerable in educational settings and investigate how this can be addressed through the re-design of whole-school inclusive learning environments.
Examine the evidence base documenting the adaptive skills needed to lead inclusive learning environments and apply these skills when planning.

assessments.task_description: From a critique of current literature, you will develop and record a video that discusses how education settings can be inclusive.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 1 grade for each 24 hour period from time submission is due will apply for up to 7 days. After 7 days you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Using either a scenario provided on UQ Learn, or a de-identified case from your own experience working in educational settings, write an essay reflecting on the strengthsÂ and areas for improvement to support a setting wanting to build and enhance an inclusive culture.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 1 grade for each 24 hour period from time submission is due will apply for up to 7 days. After 7 days you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Using either a scenario provided on UQ Learn, or a de-identified case from your own experience working in educational settings, write an action plan for strengthening inclusive culture.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 1 grade for each 24 hour period from time submission is due will apply for up to 7 days. After 7 days you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
